testcase.name: Automating booking of a flight in Ryanair Website
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home Page..................................................passed When user login the ryan air application with username and password.........passed And user selecting one way trip.............................................passed And user entering destination as " Berlin Brandenburg ".....................passed And user entering departure date as "2020-12-04"............................passed And user entering adult count as "2" ,child count as "1" and infant count as "0".passed And user clicks search button...............................................passed And selecting a ticket and selecting fare...................................passed And entering Adult1 details as "Mr Mathew Jose".............................passed And entering Adult2 details as "Mr Jose Mathew".............................passed And entering Child1 details as "Mr Mathew Sebastian"........................passed And clicking on Continue button.............................................passed And selecting seats.........................................................passed And selecting baggage type..................................................passed And selecting shopping cart and checkout....................................passed And entering contact details................................................passed Then User should be asked to login before checkout..........................passed
